item.title: Orlanda Broom: Shapeshifters | Grove Square Galleries
item.description: Producing this collection of abstract works, made with colourful resin on canvas, must have taken a toll on the artist. Orlanda Broom can only work on works using resin for a couple of months each year - otherwise the ambient temperature isn’t right. The perfectionist artist also doesn’t allow any resin works with trapped hairs and dust out of the studio. “I’m interested in the interpretation of abstract works,” she says.
